product_name: Repel 100 Insect Repellent Pump Spray - 98 Percent DEET - 4 fl. oz.
long_description: Protect yourself against biting bugs during full-day outdoor adventures with the Repel 100 insect repellent pump spray. 98% DEET formula provides effective, long-lasting protection from mosquitoes, gnats, chiggers, ticks, no-see-ums and biting flies. Repel 100 insect repellent pump spray protects for up to 10 hrs.
short_description: Protect yourself against biting bugs during full-day outdoor adventures with the Repel 100 insect repellent pump spray.
